room_title: Escape room "The House" by Mental Trap in Portland
room_description:
Escape room moving.
With a storm starting to rage it’s fury outside, you find yourselves entering a spooky old house. While exploring you and your friends get separated and unwilling become trapped. Following a series of strange, twisted clues and games, you encounter a mischievous cranky ghost who is either attempting to help you escape or wanting to keep you around… You and your team have just 60 minutes to reveal the house’s mysterious history and traps.
